product_name: BOB Duallie Infant Car Seat Adapter - Fits Graco Seats
long_description: The BOB Duallie Infant car seat adapter lets you conveniently take your infant from the car to your BOB Duallie stroller without having to remove your babe from your Graco car seat. Seat adapter is easily installed or removed, and folds with the stroller for convenience; restraint belt secures infant car seat in place. Works with the Graco SnugRide(R) and SnugRide 30 infant car seats. Adapter allows use of 1 infant car seat at a time; a snack tray is included with the system for an older child in the second seat. Compatible with 2011 and newer BOB Duallie strollers, including the Revolution SE Duallie, Strides Duallie, Sport Utility Duallie and Ironman Duallie strollers. Because of the higher center of gravity it creates, the BOB Duallie Infant car seat adapter is intended for walking use only. BOB recommends that you consult with your pediatrician regarding the suitability of stroller use with your child as each child develops at a different rate.
short_description: The BOB Duallie Infant car seat adapter lets you conveniently take your infant from the car to your BOB Duallie stroller without having to remove your babe from your Graco car seat.
